name: Shooter game (itch) (Jerememes)
description:
/////DISCLAIMER!/////

This game was a remake of somebody else's game

Link to that game: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/611836486/

/////DISCLAIMER!/////

Controls: WA to move D to run And you look towards your mouse

G to throw grenades, q to dash e to interact with spawned items

Space to shoot.

-----

Enemies

-----

Average green zombie go bruuuh

red ones go boom

Grey ones charge after you

Green ones that come in with a gun go shooty shooty bang bang

tiny ones go fast.

this game is still in development

sounds from Doom Eternal, and Left 4 Dead 2.

Linux vers soon. Linux version is here

Ported to mac, pc, and HTML through

https://packager.turbowarp.org

Props to @garbomuffin on scratch for making the compiler
